name: adpq2018
description: Homeowners Toolbox Inc. DBA HOTB Software submission for the California Department of Technology ADPQ in 2018

scripts.teardown: docker stop 'api' && docker rm -f 'api' && docker rmi 'api' && clear
scripts.test: npm run test:build && npm run test:run
scripts.test:run: docker run -v ~/Desktop/testResults:/data/testReports -e Environment=staging --name adpq_tests -i adpq_tests >> testResults.xml && docker rm adpq_tests && docker rmi adpq_tests && clear
